動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、產蛋下降症、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、產蛋下降症及傳染性鼻炎。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS 10^9EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION;INACTIVATED EDS `76 VIRUS 10^8EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION; HAEMOPHI-LUS PARAGALLINARUM(SEROTYPE A)5X10^9CFU BEFORE INACTIVATION; HAE -MOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM(SEROTYPE B) 5X10^9CFU BEFORE INACTIVATION;HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM(SEROTYPE C) 5X10^9CFU BEFORE INACTIVA-TION; SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML; LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML;THIOMERSAL 50UG.
